name: DayDoors
description:
"Your day can't start because the door to it is closed"!

"Find the right key combination to open the door to your sunny day"

Start  every day good by opening it every day and train your logical brain.

This is the demo version, register on the site and receive the complete version once it goes alpha.

Also feel free to comment in here or on the website, it helps me to improve the game.

Regards,

Alex
